items.description:
This involves using databases, search engines, and online resources to find academic articles, papers, and research on a specific topic.

 Internet-accessible online bibliographical databases are valuable sources of general references
This involves Checking the citations within relevant articles to discover other studies and sources related to your research
This involves physically going through printed journals, books, and documents in libraries or archives to find relevant literature
This inovolves seeking out authors who have a substantial publication record in the area of your interest
